mapper.insert: insert into users( phone, password, nickname, avatar, gender, student_id, school, dormitory, user_type, status, create_time, update_time ) values( #{phone}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{avatar}, #{gender}, #{studentId}, #{school}, #{dormitory}, #{userType}, #{status}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.select: select user_id, phone, password, nickname, avatar, gender, student_id, school, dormitory, balance, credit_score, user_type, status, created_at, updated_at from users order by created_at desc
mapper.update: update users set balance = #{newBalance}, updated_at = now() where user_id = #{userId}
